Title: Urban Odyssey
Description:
Did ye hear, $n?

A lot of folks from the city are eager to lend a hand an' support our attack on the nerubians and Xal'atath. I think it's worth reachin' out tae them tae see how they could pitch in.

The more support we gather, the better.
ObjectivesText: Ask around Dornogal for pledges of support in the coming conflict.
RewardText:
Thank ye, $n. The more people we get on board with helpin', the more successful we'll be.

But we won't get anywhere if we dunnae have a large enough fightin' force.

The earthen are nae in good shape. But I think Alleria may be helpin' with that.

Objectives.Text: Item upgrades and crest exchange vendors found
